parametrized_description: Determine the number of cart delivery servers and hand delivery servers such that CustomerInteractionsCart multiplied by the number of cart delivery servers plus CustomerInteractionsHand multiplied by the number of hand delivery servers meets or exceeds TargetCustomerInteractions. Ensure that at least MinFractionCart fraction of delivery shifts are by cart and that the number of hand delivery servers is at least MinServersHand. The objective is to minimize the total number of refills per hour, calculated as RefillsCart multiplied by the number of cart delivery servers plus RefillsHand multiplied by the number of hand delivery servers.

CustomerInteractionsCart.description: Customer interactions per cart delivery server per hour

CustomerInteractionsHand.description: Customer interactions per hand delivery server per hour

RefillsCart.description: Number of refills per cart delivery server per hour

RefillsHand.description: Number of refills per hand delivery server per hour

MinFractionCart.description: Minimum fraction of delivery shifts that must be by cart

MinServersHand.description: Minimum number of servers delivering by hand

TargetCustomerInteractions.description: Target total number of customer interactions per hour

NumberOfCartDeliveryServers.description: The number of cart delivery servers

NumberOfHandDeliveryServers.description: The number of hand delivery servers

constraints.description: CustomerInteractionsCart multiplied by the number of cart delivery servers plus CustomerInteractionsHand multiplied by the number of hand delivery servers must be greater than or equal to TargetCustomerInteractions.
At least MinFractionCart fraction of delivery shifts must be by cart.
The number of hand delivery servers must be at least MinServersHand.

objective.description: Minimize the total number of refills per hour, calculated as RefillsCart multiplied by the number of cart delivery servers plus RefillsHand multiplied by the number of hand delivery servers.
